sentences.en: Advertisements, TV shows, movies, and books all capitalize on the image.
sentences.cn: 广告 、 电视节目 、 电影和书籍都在为这个形象投资.

sentences.en: Advertisers capitalize on the grandness and elegance it brings to their products.
sentences.cn: 广告投放者将高贵和典雅等特质赋予到他们的产品中.

sentences.en: Everyone should capitalize on his opportunity.
sentences.cn: 每个人都应当利用机会。

sentences.en: He's decided to capitalize all his property.
sentences.cn: 他决定把全部财产变为资本.

sentences.en: How can companies capitalize? One way is to take their cash abroad.
sentences.cn: 公司应当如何投资? 方法之一,是将现金用于国外投资.

sentences.en: Our intention is to capitalize the company by any means we can.
sentences.cn: 我们的意图是想方设法出售这个公司以获取奖金。

sentences.en: Passwords are case - sensitive, so note which letters you capitalize.
sentences.cn: 密码要区分大小写, 要注意大写的字母.
这个字母应不应该大写?

sentences.en: The bank has promised to capitalize our new business.
sentences.cn: 银行已经承诺提供资金给我们的企业.

sentences.en: The criminals sometimes just capitalize on your mistakes to commit crimes.
sentences.cn: 有些罪犯有时就是利用你的错误去犯罪.

sentences.en: The question now is how effectively Arafat will capitalize on these assets.
sentences.cn: 现在的问题是,阿拉法特将如何有效地利用这些资产.

sentences.en: The rebels seem to be trying to capitalize on the public's discontent with the government.
sentences.cn: 反叛者们似乎正试图利用公众对政府的不满情绪。

sentences.en: The team was unable to capitalize on the power play.
sentences.cn: 那支队伍无法通过集中进攻而占到便宜.

sentences.en: The world of science, prepared for the unexpected, could capitalize swiftly on Becquerel's chance discovery.
sentences.cn: 科学界对这意外发现是有准备的, 因而能迅速地利用贝克勒耳的偶然发现.

sentences.en: This " lattice analogy'seeks to capitalize on well - established methods for analysis of framed structures.
sentences.cn: 搞这种 “ 格架模型”是为了可以利用成熟的分析钢架结构方法.

sentences.en: We tried to capitalize the customers'curiosity to increase our gross sales.
sentences.cn: 我们曾试图利用顾客的好奇心理提高销售总额.
